ValidationRule.description: An active org limit type should have valid Retention Period, Retrieval Frequency and Threshold Limit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IsActive__c, OR( ISNULL( RetentionPeriod__c ), ISNULL( RetrievalFrequency__c ), ISNULL( AlertThreshold__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Active records should have valid Retention Period, Retrieval Frequency and Alert Threshold
